body:
Hi Grasshope and Theodore.



Try the new butterfly. It should work with the latest version of OpenFOAM and you should be able to run the analysis from inside Grasshopper.

[Here](https://github.com/mostaphaRoudsari/Butterfly/issues/43#issuecomment-238628282) is the directions for updating the current installation. Sorry for the delay. I was a way for a couple of weeks.



Mostapha
